params._offerId: The ID of the offer to accept.
The ID of the offer to cancel.

returns.offerId: The unique integer ID assigned to the offer.

getAllOffers(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns all active (i.e. non-expired or cancelled) offers.

getAllValidOffers(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns all valid offers. An offer is valid if the offeror owns and has approved Marketplace to transfer the offer amount of currency.

getOffer(uint256).notice: Returns an offer for the given offer ID.
